actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 101-565, by Mr. Gordon.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 126.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 355 - 58 (Roll no. 226).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill (S. 933) to establish a clear and comprehensive prohibition of discrimination on the basis of disability, and against its consideration.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Waives points of order against the conference report on S. 933 (prohibiting discrimination based on disability) and against its consideration.

titles.title: Waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill (S. 933) to establish a clear and comprehensive prohibition of discrimination on the basis of disability, and against its consideration.
